attributes.action: put down a motion of 'no confidence' in the House of Commons to Parliment at the earliest oppertunity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Her Majesties subjects have no confidence in their elected members due to the considerable fall out over second homes, expences and renumeration.  Parliament is now unable to function as normal as it deals with this crisis.

Members should resign, face their consituancies with their expences record availble and let the people decide who is honerable enough to be their MP.

It is esential that confidence in the parliamentry system be restored as quickly as possible.

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
